data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Onconeura Andersen et Saether (Diptera: Chironomidae), with the description of four new species from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wiedenbrug, Sofia, Mendes, Humberto F., Pepinelli, Mateus, Trivinho-Strixino, Susana (2009): Review of the genus Onconeura Andersen et Saether (Diptera: Chironomidae), with the description of four new species from Brazil. Zootaxa 2265: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190820
